ja487:5.2: Dummakkharūpā → dummudharūpā (bj, mr) | dummukharūpā (pts-vp-pli1ed), mantaṃ jappanti → yeme japanti (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | ye mantaṃ japanti (sya1ed, sya2ed) | ye'me jappanti mante (^ja377#3 [Setaketujātaka])
ja487:6.1: karetha → karotha (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | kareyya (sya1ed, sya2ed) | katvāna (^ja377#4 [Setaketujātaka])
ja487:20.3: sajātiṃ pamuñcanti → na tesaṃ jātiṃ pucchanti (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | na tesaṃ jāti sujjhati (mr)
